Introduction to micro-frontends and Self Contained Systems (SCS) on my blog

#microfrontends #selfcontainedsystems

Check it out - @FlorianRappl has published an article discussing the results of his survey on #MicroFrontEnds, read it here: https://t.co/st3acrkpeJ

@bitdev_ #FrontEnd #FrontEndDevelopment #SoftwareDevelopment #WebDevelopment https://t.co/vfpvWOdAH8
Today I have the chance to enjoy @lucamezzalira giving a workshop about #microfrontends.  Is a pleasure hearing him talking  and sharing his experience about his journey with microfrontends.
Can we stop calling them #Microfrontends and maybe call them Micro Apps Pattern (MAP) or something.. Because in reality they are supposed to be mutually exclusive & independant Micro Apps

@FlorianRappl @bitdev_ Very interesting findings and great to see #Piral up the list inspite of being one of the newer frameworks. Also there is a need for flexibility for #microfrontends which frameworks like #reactjs and #vuejs provide.
Learn from others... the #results for the #microfrontends #survey by @FlorianRappl are out! #piral https://t.co/LC5NSHanHG
Results of my #microfrontends #survey are in! #article @bitdev_ https://t.co/AIiMK6HqU4

Curious about #microfrontends? Check out this post and see why micro frontends may be the future of desktop interoperability and business workflows. Free whitepaper download by Cosaic CTO @terrencethorsen. #javascript #Interoperability #finsemble

https://t.co/tGCH8whLIW https://t.co/W6QgcprfEc
Giving your dev teams end-to-end control over their updates enables them to innovate at the pace of their ideas. Perhaps the best way to do this is with #microfrontends
I am lookong forward to this event! Great to give at talk next week about  #microfrontends @manc_web https://t.co/ACChO3scp8
#Appshell vs #ascell, otto ore di lezione dove ogni volta che nomino questa parola penso a questa situazione. Crazy #microfrontends https://t.co/996pAzugeC
